languages.text:
All allies in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area have {uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} bonus to Willpower, receive 50% less damage from Daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horrors of the Warp{/g} effect.
Upon starting their turn in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area, allies gain 1 stack of {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Warp Tranquility{/g} until the end of combat (up to 5).

traits.locale_text:
All allies in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area have {uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} bonus to Willpower, receive 50% less damage from Daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horrors of the Warp{/g} effect.
Upon starting their turn in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} area, allies gain 1 stack of {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Warp Tranquility{/g} until the end of combat (up to 5).

languages.text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp solace{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.

If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp solace{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

languages.text:
Все союзники в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона получают +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, снижение урона от атак демонов на 50% и иммунитет к {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасам варпа{/g}.
Союзник, начинающий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}утешение варпа{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
Все союзники в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона получают +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, снижение урона от атак демона на 50% и иммунитет к эффекту {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасов варпа{/g}.
Союзник, начинающий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, получает 1 уровень эффекта {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}утешение варпа{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.

Все союзники в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона получают +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, снижение урона от атак демона на 50% и иммунитет к эффекту {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасов варпа{/g}.
Союзник, начинающий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, получает 1 уровень эффекта {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}утешение варпа{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.

Все союзники в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона получают +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}, снижение урона от атак демонов на 50% и иммунитет к {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}ужасам варпа{/g}.
Союзник, начинающий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}утешение варпа{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの周囲4セル以内にいるすべての味方は、+{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} の {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}を得る。デーモンから受けるダメージが50%減少し、{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}<歪み>のホラ{/g}効果を無効化する。
味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時にサイバーレイヴンの周囲4セル以内にいる場合、戦闘終了まで {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}ワープの静穏{/g}を1スタック獲得する。最大 5 スタック。
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンの周囲4セル以内にいるすべての味方は、+{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} の {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}を得る。デーモンから受けるダメージが50%減少し、{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}<歪み>のホラ{/g}効果を無効化する。
味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時にサイバーレイヴンの周囲4セル以内にいる場合、戦闘終了まで {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}ワープの静穏{/g}を1スタック獲得する。最大 5 スタック。

languages.text:
Tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille gagnent un bonus de +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, les démons leur infligent −50 % de dégâts et ils sont immunisés contre l'effet {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horreurs du Warp{/g}.
Si un allié commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, il gagne +1 cumul de l'effet {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Réconfort du Warp{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois.
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
Tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille gagnent un bonus de +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, les démons leur infligent −50 % de dégâts et ils sont immunisés contre l'effet {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Horreurs du Warp{/g}.
Si un allié commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, il gagne +1 cumul de l'effet {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Sérénité du Warp{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois.

languages.text:
Todos los aliados en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo ganan +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, sufren un −50 % menos de daño de ataques de daemons y son inmunes al efecto de {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrores de la disformidad{/g}.
Si un aliado empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo, gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Solaz de la disformidad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta 5 veces.
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
Todos los aliados en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo ganan +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, sufren un −50 % menos de daño de ataques de daemons y son inmunes al efecto de {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrores de la disformidad{/g}.
Si un aliado empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo, gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}disformidad tranquila{/g} hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta 5 veces.

languages.text:
所有距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有盟友{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c}点，被恶魔攻击时受到的伤害降低50%，且对{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}亚空间的恐怖{/g}效果免疫。
如果盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，与生化渡鸦之间的距离不超过4格，则获得1层{g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}亚空间的慰藉{/g}效果。此效果最多可叠加5层，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
所有距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有盟友{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c}点，被恶魔攻击时受到的伤害降低50%，且对{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}亚空间的恐怖{/g}效果免疫。
如果盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，与生化渡鸦之间的距离不超过4格，则获得1层{g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}亚空间宁静{/g}效果。此效果最多可叠加5层，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Pstitech-Raben erhalten +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, erleiden −50 % weniger Schaden durch Dämonen und sind immun gegen den Effekt{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Schrecken des Warp{/g}.
Beginnt ein Verbündeter seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Pstitech-Raben, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Stapel des {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Trost des Warp{/g}-Effektes. Bis zu 5-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
Alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Pstitech-Raben erhalten +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, erleiden −50 % weniger Schaden durch Dämonen und sind immun gegen den Effekt{g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}Schrecken des Warp{/g}.
Beginnt ein Verbündeter seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Pstitech-Raben, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Stapel des {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Warptranquilität{/g}-Effektes. Bis zu 5-mal stapelbar.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimler; {uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} kazanır, iblislerden %50 daha az hasar alır ve {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}öteboyut dehşetleri{/g} etkisine karşı bağışıklık elde eder.
Bir dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde başlarsa +1 {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}Öteboyut Tesellisi{/g} etkisi birikimi elde eder. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. 5 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text:
All allies in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven gain +{uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, suffer −50% less damage from daemons, and are immune to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
If an ally starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}warp tranquility{/g} effect until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times.

traits.locale_text:
Ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimler; {uip|WPBonus|1ff86f1bc340493d9ca708f838c7678c} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} kazanır, iblislerden %50 daha az hasar alır ve {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}öteboyut dehşetleri{/g} etkisine karşı bağışıklık elde eder.
Bir dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde başlarsa +1 {g|f:d601afbd98d44f7fb57fe84c12f2dc59}öteboyut dinginliği{/g} etkisi birikimi elde eder. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. 5 kez üst üste birikebilir.
